com.rhizospherejs.gwt.rebind
Class RhizosphereGenerator

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.ext.Generator
      com.rhizospherejs.gwt.rebind.RhizosphereGenerator

public class RhizosphereGenerator
extends com.google.gwt.core.ext.Generator

Code generator that generates RhizosphereMapping implementations from RhizosphereModel subclasses.

The purpose of this generator is to let Rhizosphere users use their custom POJOs to define the datasets Rhizosphere will visualize.

Rhizosphere defines a dataset as a set of models (each model represents a single datapoint of the dataset) and an associated metamodel (to contain the dataset metadata). Rhizosphere internally uses custom tailored JavaScriptObjects to represent both models and metamodels.

The generator parses POJOs marked with the RhizosphereModel interface, associated RhizosphereModelAttribute annotations and related interfaces and emits implementations of RhizosphereMapping which are capable of transforming user provided POJOs into Rhizosphere-compatible models and metamodel instances.

Code generation proceeds as follows:

  • BridgeCapabilities determine which Java types can be successfully converted into Rhizosphere data types.
  • ModelInspector analyzes the user-defined POJO and identifies all the attributes that must be exposed within Rhizosphere, along with the associated metadata.
  • MappingWriter uses the information extracted by the previous 2 steps a generates factories capable of converting user-provided POJOs into Rhizosphere-compatible JavaScriptObjects.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)
